item.description:
Learn the basics of attracting into your life what you want - from a place of focus, love and letting go. Learn and use psychological and spiritual techniques of affirmations, gratitude, and core love energy. We will also explore how to love yourself emotionally, intellectually, physically and spiritually. Call or email for more detailed directions.

Optional macrobiotic meal (fabulous from experienced macro chef) from 7 to 8:30pm, an additional $20.


8:30 pm -10 pm

Cost: $30 - Sliding scale to $15

Herb Pearce, M.Ed. in Counseling, has taught a number of workshops gratitude and being your authentic self. He is a leading expert in the Enneagram, having taught 2000 Enneagram workshops in over 20 years. He is the author of The Idiot's Guide to the Enneagram (which you can purchase from him), is a therapist for individuals, couples, and families who specializes in enhancing relationship satisfaction through understanding and better communication regarding personality differences. He does phone sessions and leads trainings for groups, organizations and companies.

www.herbpearce.com
herb@herbpearce.com
781 648 3737
item.name: Love, Gratitude and The Law of Attraction
